Package org.hypermedea.op.file

package org.hypermedea.op.file

File binding, with support for GET, PUT, POST and DELETE (read, write, append and delete).

By default, if a URI is relative (i.e. if it has no scheme), it is interpreted as a relative path and any operation on that URI will be handled by the file binding.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.hypermedea.op
    Protocol binding package, with common interface and base implementations.
    org.hypermedea.op.http
    HTTP binding, supporting all operation types except WATCH.
